comment: The support team was incredibly helpful during my application process. The merit scholarship covered my full tuition fees. Highly recommended for sincere students!
A great platform for finding niche scholarships. I received the 'Women in Tech' grant. Documentation process was a bit long, but worth the effort.
Transparent selection process and fast communication. The university itself is top-notch with excellent faculty.
The course content is strong, but the administrative fees are quite high, even with the partial scholarship. Could improve on student services.
Securing a spot here was the best decision. The campus environment is diverse and highly motivating. Zero complaints about the academic quality.
